mapper.insert: insert into TB_POSTAGE_MENU (MENU_ID, MENU_NAME, PARENT_ID, STATUS, TYPE, URL, TARGET, SORT, REMARK, ICON, HOME_PAGE_NAME) values (#{menuId,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{menuName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{parentId,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{status,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{type,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{url,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{target,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{sort,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{icon,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{homePageName,jdbcType=VARCHAR})
mapper.update: update TB_POSTAGE_MENU set MENU_NAME = #{menuName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, PARENT_ID = #{parentId,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, STATUS = #{status,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, TYPE = #{type,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, URL = #{url,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, TARGET = #{target,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, SORT = #{sort,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, REMARK = #{remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ICON = #{icon,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, HOME_PAGE_NAME = #{homePageName,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where MENU_ID = #{menuId,jdbcType=DECIMAL}
mapper.select: select MENU_ID, MENU_NAME, PARENT_ID, STATUS, TYPE, URL, TARGET, SORT, REMARK, ICON, HOME_PAGE_NAME from TB_POSTAGE_MENU where MENU_ID = #{menuId,jdbcType=DECIMAL}
select MENU_ID, MENU_NAME, PARENT_ID, STATUS, TYPE, URL, TARGET, SORT, REMARK, ICON, HOME_PAGE_NAME from TB_POSTAGE_MENU
